title: Jacket, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, mica, shells
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Short jacket with long sleeves. Woven in stripes of dark blue, orange and red. Back and neck opening elaborately decorated with mica and small shells.

Jacket, 19th century.Medium: cotton, mica, shells
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. 1961-115-18.
